attributes.review: I still don’t understand how you people could vote for an inanimate object. Trump is a literal orange and should not be elected for president for 2020. Anyway we aren’t here to talk about the disgusting pig 🐷excuse for a president, we have we are here to talk about the app. As soon as I opened to app I couldn’t stop throwing up!!!!🤢🤮🤮🤮it’s just seeing Trump’s face made me want to throw myself off of a cliff. In conclusion this app is repulsive and you shouldn’t download it. (BTW Trump your NOT going to take tik tok away from us) 🙃😘😁

donald trump is useless and close minded and has done nothing but harm this country. before you dismiss this review, i ask you to really think about what i’m saying. donald trump truly only cares about the comfort of life for straight, white, christian males. if you support him, i urge you to consider what it must be like for all people. put yourself in the shoes of an immigrant, woman, trans person, muslim, black person etc in america today. this is NOT what liberty and justice for all looks like!!
attributes.title: please read..

attributes.review:
It took hours to download. And when it finally finished it glitched up my whole screen. I reset my phone hoping it would stop glitching, but when my phone finished 
resetting it was so glitchy that I couldn’t open my phone. I eventually got a whole new phone! Now i have a worse phone than i did before. I had a iPhone 8 before and now i have a iPhone 6.✨So in conclusion, i think this app is absolutely terrible✨
attributes.title: 🟠✨Absolute garbage✨🟠

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I could have possibly downloaded!!!! This app made my phone glitch so bad until the point it was unbearable! Not to mention every time this app was open EVEN IN THE BACKGROUND my phone would over heat to extreme temperatures! I would not recommend downloading this app even if you are a trump supporting low life racist!!!😊 this is a Gen z take over and we will not be silenced what you try to take from us we will take from you.
attributes.title: Horrible app😡

attributes.review: This app is terrible crap. nothing educational about it. everytime i go to click something on the app, a picture of a giant cheeto pops up and starts talking everytime. the app crashes no matter what you do everytime you try to exit and get back in. The app is absolutely terrible. my grandma had this app and she said when she first entered there was nothing but foul language being spewed from the app. this app is communist, fascist, totalitarian and overall TERRIBLE.
attributes.title: Crappy 👁👄👁

attributes.review: This is the WORST APP EVER!!! It’s very unprofessional and it glitched the entire time and it was slow, I honestly was expecting better but I was disappointed and I can’t believe how some of these people actually like this Cheeto and his stupid app. He’s a racist, homophobic, and a rapist, so obviously we shouldn’t support this man because he is disrespectful and a horrible person and if you don’t think so then you are also a horrible person and a racist and you’re also stupid, PERIOD!!!!
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: This guy deserves to be in jail after all the bad things he’s ever done in  america. He is very racist against all different races. How tf are you only going to like white people. I still don’t understand why he spray tans his body orange like, what the hell💀 Oh yeah that’s where he belongs. Matter fact he can burn in there too. While the whole country would be celebrating 🥳🥳. Now orange man if you could do all of us a favor and quit your job and also 🔚 we would be very happy 😌. Ty 🙃
attributes.title: Orange man 😌⛓

attributes.review: Hey, so i downloaded this app to try and support our great Cheeto prez, but it turns out, this isn’t even the official app!!! He has 2 apps that will actually benefit this amazing country! 1 is called Trump Justice, where you play as our little Trumpkin and fight bad guys like people who happen to have different opinions. 2 is called “Learn some common sense”, where you learn how to not regurgitate everything you see on fox news and escape the almost cult that is supporting Trump. Hope this helps!
attributes.title: FOR THE TRUMP SUPPORTERS

attributes.review:
Ha ha let’s not vote for the racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, sexist, pedo president please. I don’t know how to tell y’all that you should care about other people we did the me vs us debate like a looong time ago like we s h o u l d be passed that part of evolution but I guess not. 

I’d also really like to have basic human rights but I realize that’s a lot to ask for in the home of the free and the brave 

Anyway I’m just leaving this review so maybe one day the app will be deleted or smth idk. Black lives matter and acab aight bye
attributes.title: Terrible

There was a glitch that had a bug in the app my phone was hacked and my credit card, Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok were all deleted. My credit card has no money in it DO NOT GET THIS APP if you do good luck because you will have to buy a new phone>:(
